Plot: He hears the 'click'. Lowers his head. Damn. He is standing on a mine. If he moves, it will explode. How will he get through this ? He doesn't have much time left... He hesitates. Waits. ...
Title: Last Call
Writer: Camille Delamarre, Cécile Larripa, Philippe Pinel
Actors: David Atrakchi, Sophie Meister, Zazie Pruvot, Florent Guyot
